title: Bayern Munich midfielder Philippe Coutinho blasted by Dietmar Hamann
text:
Philippe Coutinho looks like a 'stranger' in the Bayern Munich team and 'only counts as half a player' at the moment, according to Dietmar Hamann.

The former Liverpool midfielder blasted the former Reds playmaker, who is on loan from Barcelona at Bayern and struggling to find his best form.

Coutinho moved to the Nou Camp for £142million in 2018 but is trying to reignite his career in Germany after being considered surplus to requirements by Ernesto Valverde.

Philippe Coutinho looks a 'stranger' in the Bayern Munich team, said Dietmar Hamann

And Hamann is not impressed with what he's seen. He told Bild: 'For me, he is a stranger in the team.

'I cannot remember a good situation [he's produced] in attack. If you have such a player in the team and he does not show any special moments, then, of course, you get problems because in the defence he only counts as half a player.

'He has 30 or 35 games left so he has to start sometime [to show good performances]. He is still on loan from Barca until the end of the season.'

Coutinho again failed to deliver the kind of cutting edge he's provided in the past during Bayern's 3-2 win at Olympiacos on Tuesday and Nico Kovac had to defend his performance after the match.
description: Philippe Coutinho looks like a 'stranger' in the Bayern Munich team and 'only counts as half a player' at the moment, according to Dietmar Hamann.
